item.title: The Return of the Malwarebytes Crackme
item.description: Malwarebytes released their 3rd crackme, here’s my entry for the writeup contest. You can find the original announcement here and the contest summary here. 0. First Look Running the crackme, we understand we’ll be asked to find 3 passwords. Only the first button is enabled, so they will most likely need to be found in order Loading the binary into PE-bear reveals it’s a Dot Net binary so let’s open it in dnSpy
